entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as being on top of, and then pulled out of the wreckage by Ron. She is also mentioned to be clutching the sword of Gryﬃndor with a goblin.

entities.name: draco
entities.description: Draco is described as doubling over, covering his bloody face. He is also mentioned to be holding the three wands and then having them wrested away by Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as running to pull Hermione out of the wreckage.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as taking the chance to wrestle the three wands from Draco's grip and then casting a triple spell on Greyback.

entities.name: greyback
entities.description: Greyback is described as being lifted oﬀ his feet by the triple spell, ﬂew up to the ceiling and then smashed to the ground.

entities.name: narcissa
entities.description: Narcissa is described as dragging Draco out of the way of further harm.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is described as brandishing a silver knife and then being directed by Narcissa's wand at the doorway.

entities.name: goblin
entities.description: The goblin is described as clutching the sword of Gryﬃndor with Hermione.

relationships.description: Harry cast a triple spell on Greyback, lifting him oﬀ his feet and smashing him to the ground.
Narcissa directed her wand at Bellatrix, preventing her from causing further harm.
